searchParameters.q: The Village at Mayo Clinic, Hope Lodge website

organic.title: Rochester, MN Hope Lodge | American Cancer Society
organic.snippet: The American Cancer Society Hope Lodge in Rochester, which opened in 1999, offers 62 guest rooms located near treatment centers in the area.

organic.title: Lodging/housing option at Mayo for patients in radiation
organic.snippet: The Hope Lodge provides accommodation to patients who are undergoing radiation treatment. All you need is to obtain a referral from your Doctor.

organic.title: What is Hope Lodge? | American Cancer Society
organic.snippet: American Cancer Society Hope Lodge® communities offer a home away from home for people facing cancer and their caregivers when cancer treatment is far away.

organic.title: New Two-story Hope Lodge Casita at Village at Mayo Clinic Set to ...
organic.snippet: The 10,000-square-foot casita will feature 12 bathrooms and bedrooms, kitchens, great rooms, dining areas, laundry, libraries and an elevator.

organic.title: Contact Us - Arizona Transplant House
organic.snippet: Mailing Address: The Village at Mayo Clinic. Arizona Transplant House. 5811 East Mayo Boulevard. Phoenix, AZ 85054. Phone: 480-609-1324. Fax: 480-609-7268.
